newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks end up as investors return.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks end up as investors return.

text.p: Dhaka stocks closed higher as investors made fresh commitments after the end of a market correction, brokers said.

The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all-share price index rose 9.08 points or 0.79 percent at 1,148.74 on a turnover of 115.1 million taka. Of the total 117 issues traded 80 closed higher, 26 ended low and 11 remained unchanged.

National Bank rose 2.77 taka to 215.99, Bengal Carbide gained 5.64 to 845.83, Bengal Food rose 88.72 to 355.55, Singer Bangladesh rose 73.44 to 10,404.66 and Apex Spinning & Knitting Mills was up 5.08 to 198.56.
